parameters.name: IncludeLogonDetails
parameters.description: Include detailed sign-in information for the user

200.description: Successful operation. Returns an array of user objects with the following properties: - id (string): User's unique identifier - userPrincipalName (string): User's principal name (email address) - displayName (string): User's display name - accountEnabled (boolean): Whether the account is enabled - username (string): Username portion of the email - onPremisesSyncEnabled (boolean): Whether user is synced from on-premises - LicJoined (string): Comma-separated list of assigned licenses - Aliases (string): Comma-separated list of email aliases - primDomain (object): Primary domain information with value and label - manager (object): Manager information including id, userPrincipalName, and displayName When IncludeLogonDetails=true, additional fields are included: - LastSigninApplication (string): Last application used to sign in - LastSigninDate (string): Last sign-in date - LastSigninStatus (string): Last sign-in operation - LastSigninResult (string): Result status of last sign-in - LastSigninFailureReason (string): Reason for sign-in failure or success message

get.description: Retrieves a list of users from Microsoft 365 tenants with filtering, licensing information, and optional sign-in details
